tasks.title: Project Setup and Initialization
tasks.description: Set up the project structure and install dependencies
tasks.details: Initialize Node.js project, install Playwright, TypeScript, Express, and other dependencies, and create the basic file structure according to the PRD.

tasks.title: Frontend UI Implementation
tasks.description: Develop the user interface for the web automation tool
tasks.details: Create HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the main application window according to the PRD design. Implement the URL input field, Start/Save Session buttons, session list view, and replay logs panel.

tasks.title: Session Recording Functionality
tasks.description: Implement the ability to record web browsing sessions using Playwright's codegen
tasks.details: Develop the backend functionality to launch Playwright codegen, capture user interactions, generate TypeScript code, and save sessions. Integrate with the UI to trigger recording and saving processes.

tasks.title: Session Management System
tasks.description: Implement session management system for saved automation sessions
tasks.details: Create functionality to list, select, and delete saved sessions. Implement file handling for session files with proper naming conventions, store session metadata, and handle file conflicts with appropriate dialog options.

tasks.title: Session Replay System
tasks.description: Develop session replay functionality to execute saved automation scripts
tasks.details: Implement the ability to execute saved TypeScript automation scripts in headed browser mode. Add real-time logging display, success/failure status reporting, and stop/cancel functionality.

tasks.title: Error Handling and Notifications
tasks.description: Implement error handling and notification system
tasks.details: Add comprehensive error handling for URL validation, replay failures, and file conflicts according to the PRD requirements. Implement a notification system to display warnings and confirmations to users.

tasks.title: Application Lifecycle Management
tasks.details: Implement startup and shutdown processes, including loading saved sessions on launch, initializing UI in ready state, confirmation dialog for application closure, cleanup of running processes, and state saving functionality.

tasks.title: System Integration and Process Management
tasks.description: Set up system integration and process management
tasks.details: Implement process management for handling Playwright codegen and execution processes. Ensure proper integration between frontend and backend components, and establish communication channels between the web UI and Node.js server.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Create comprehensive testing suite for the application
tasks.details: Develop unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all core functionalities of the web automation application. Ensure that all success criteria from the PRD are properly validated.

tasks.title: Documentation and User Guide
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the web automation application
tasks.details: Develop user documentation including installation instructions, usage guides, and troubleshooting information. Create developer documentation for future maintenance and extension of the application.
